keyMoments.title: Usopp's Battle Against Perona Begins
keyMoments.description: Usopp faces off against Perona, revealing his weapon Kabuto and preparing to fight despite her overwhelming Horo Horo no Mi abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of one of Usopp's most important battles in the Thriller Bark arc.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Uses Ageha Ryusei
keyMoments.description: Usopp fires his Ageha Ryusei (Butterfly Meteor) technique from his Kabuto slingshot for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this Kabuto technique during Thriller Bark.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Uses Kamakiri Ryusei
keyMoments.description: Usopp follows up with Kamakiri Ryusei (Praying Mantis Meteor), firing a large explosive projectile.
keyMoments.significance: Another demonstration of Usopp's new Kabuto techniques.

keyMoments.title: Sogeking Returns at Thriller Bark
keyMoments.description: Facing certain defeat, Usopp calls upon his alter ego Sogeking to help him overcome his fear and defeat Kumashi.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the return of Usopp's Sogeking persona during Thriller Bark.

keyMoments.title: Sogeking Purifies Kumashi
keyMoments.description: Sogeking shoots a salt projectile into Kumashi's mouth, purifying the bear zombie.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's knowledge of how to defeat zombies and marks a turning point in the battle.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Recalls Perona's Behavioral Change
keyMoments.description: Usopp uses his observation skills to deduce that Perona must be controlling her astral form from elsewhere.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Usopp's intelligence as a strategist.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Discovers Perona's Hidden Room
keyMoments.description: Following his deduction, Usopp discovers the hidden door to Perona's room where her real body is located.
keyMoments.significance: The pivotal discovery that will allow Usopp to defeat Perona.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Uses Atlas Suisei
keyMoments.description: Usopp fires his Atlas Suisei (Atlas Comet) technique, destroying the door to Perona's room.
keyMoments.significance: The decisive attack that breaks through Perona's defenses.

abilities.description: Usopp fires a large projectile from Kabuto that leaves behind a trail of smoke resembling butterfly wings.
Usopp fires a large explosive projectile from Kabuto that erupts in a green explosion.
Usopp fires four Kayaku Boshi at high speed with smoke trails that converge together, with arcs resembling the horns of an Atlas beetle.

reveals.information: Revealed three new Kabuto techniques: Ageha Ryusei, Kamakiri Ryusei, and Atlas Suisei
Demonstrated exceptional observational and deductive skills in discovering Perona's weakness

keyMoments.title: Perona Demonstrates Size Manipulation
keyMoments.description: Perona demonstrates her ability to change size dramatically with her astral projection, first appearing as a giant then shrinking to evade attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the full versatility of Perona's astral form abilities.

keyMoments.title: Perona Phases Through Usopp
keyMoments.description: Perona demonstrates the intangibility of her astral projection by passing her hands through Usopp's body.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals both the terror and the limitation of Perona's powers - she cannot physically harm opponents in astral form.

keyMoments.title: Perona Unleashes Mini Hollows
keyMoments.description: Perona summons numerous Mini Hollows, palm-sized ghosts that swarm around Usopp as part of her offensive arsenal.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Perona's offensive ghost technique.

keyMoments.title: Perona's Ghost Rap Explosions
keyMoments.description: Perona snaps her fingers to detonate her Mini Hollows with devastating explosive force through her Ghost Rap technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the lethal potential of Perona's Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Kumashi is Purified
keyMoments.description: Perona loses her loyal servant Kumashi when Sogeking purifies him with salt, leaving her mortified and without her strongest physical defender.
keyMoments.significance: Represents a major setback in Perona's battle strategy.

keyMoments.title: Perona's Room is Discovered
keyMoments.description: Usopp discovers the hidden location where Perona's real body lies defenseless, exposing her critical weakness.
keyMoments.significance: The discovery that will lead to Perona's defeat as her invincibility is revealed to be an illusion.

affiliations.role: Commander of Wild Zombies and Surprise Zombies

abilities.description: Perona creates miniature ghosts the size of her palm which she sends toward her opponent.
After sending Mini Hollows toward an opponent, Perona makes them explode with a snap of her fingers, creating powerful explosions.

relationships.description: Kumashi is Perona's loyal bear zombie servant who fights on her behalf.

evolutionMoments.description: Perona loses Kumashi when he is purified by Sogeking.

reveals.information: Revealed Mini Hollow and Ghost Rap techniques as part of her Horo Horo no Mi arsenal
Her astral projection cannot physically harm opponents, and her real body is vulnerable while projecting

keyMoments.title: Moria Attacks Luffy with Doppelman
keyMoments.description: Luffy battles Gecko Moria who uses his Doppelman shadow clone to intercept Luffy's attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Continues Luffy's intense battle against one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Uses Gomu Gomu no Fingernet
keyMoments.description: Luffy counters Moria's Brick Bat attack by stretching his fingers into a net formation to catch and smash the shadow bats.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's creative use of his rubber powers for defensive purposes.

abilities.description: Luffy stretches his fingers and creates a net formation to catch or counter enemy attacks.

reveals.information: Revealed Gomu Gomu no Fingernet technique as a defensive counter move

keyMoments.title: Moria Attacks Luffy with Doppelman
keyMoments.description: Moria, still furious about Luffy's earlier kick, uses his Doppelman shadow clone to attack Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Moria's anger and his versatile shadow manipulation abilities.

keyMoments.title: Kumashi Joins the Battle
keyMoments.description: Kumashi enters the fight against Usopp, attacking with overwhelming physical strength that exceeds a real bear.
keyMoments.significance: Adds physical danger to complement Perona's ghost abilities in the battle.

keyMoments.title: Sogeking Purifies Kumashi
keyMoments.description: Sogeking shoots a salt projectile into Kumashi's mouth, purifying the bear zombie and removing his shadow.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of Kumashi as Perona's servant and demonstrates the effectiveness of salt against zombies.

relationships.description: Kumashi loyally serves Perona as her bear zombie companion.

evolutionMoments.description: Kumashi is purified by Sogeking, ending his service to Perona.

reveals.information: Kumashi is purified and loses his shadow, becoming an inanimate object once again
